content: 10/5/2015 data text/html <html contenteditable> mostly harmless note all stitches are worked in the front loop only chain 2 1 2 single_crochet in second chain from hook chain 1 turn 2 2 single_crochet in each st chain 1 turn 3 single_crochet in each st to last 2 st 2 single_crochet in each of last 2 st chain 1 turn 4 2 single_crochet in each of first 2 st single_crochet in each st across to end chain 1 turn 5 single_crochet in each st across to last 2 st 2 single_crochet in each of last 2 st chain 1 turn 6 2 single_crochet in each of first 2 st single_crochet in each st across leaving last 4 st unworked chain 1 turn repeat row 3­6 until desired size is reached fasten_off and weave in ends block ~~~ mostly harmless small teeth this version works well for dk worsted or aran weight yarns note all stitches are worked in the front loop only chain 2 1 2 single_crochet in second chain from hook chain 1 turn 2 2 single_crochet in each st chain 1 turn 3 single_crochet in each st to last 2 st 2 single_crochet in each of last 2 st chain 1 turn 4 2 single_crochet in each of first 2 st single_crochet in each st across leaving last 2 st unworked chain 1 turn repeat row 3­4 until desired size is reached fasten_off and weave in ends block data text/html <html contenteditable> 1/1
